price: Onyankopͻn na εyε N’asεdeε sε Ɔkyerε kwan tenee no; na akwan no bi nso wͻ hͻ a amane. Sε εyε Nepε a, anka Ɔbεkyerε mo nyinaa kwan (tenenee no).
arabic: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصۡدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا جَآئِرٞۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waʿalā al-lahi qaṣdu al-sabīli wamin'hā jāirun walaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
translations: surely He would have guided you
